name: Global Infonet
description:
Global Infonet is a Jacksonville, Florida based company that serves a multitude of organizations nationally. We are a full-service IT firm specializing in application development, Business Intelligence, application support and business process solutions. Our team is customer focused and consists of dedicated professionals who understand your business.
We value the needs and goals of our clients and consistently exceed their expectations. We are able to leverage experience, creativity and excellence to help you achieve your goals. Whether it is through our status as a Microsoft Partner or our years of on the ground experience, we can tailor a solution that is right for you. Global was recently named one of the Jacksonville Business Journal’s Top "40 under 40" companies. And, it is an ISO 9001 Certified Company. We’re not a big, lumbering army of people who try to make your problem fit its one-size-fits-all solution. We’re like a Special Forces strike team. We respond and deliver quickly, efficiently, accurately, and we are a proven winner! We have the ability and resources to tailor a solution that will benefit our clients’ needs functionally and financially in the short and long terms. We are one of the very best at what we do. Our customer-satisfaction record proves this.
READ MORE...
